title: Open Beta
body: RIOT puts up an article to do with the open beta being live this has no been taken down along with the discussion regading it can someone tell me what is going on?

replies.body:
It was probably a mispost that was posted a tad bit too soon. Open Beta is live on OCE but isn't quite live on the other regions just yet. Hang on for a bit longer and you should see that [more information](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) on this pop-up about the Open Beta.

Let me know if you have any questions.
looks like it was classic misdirection! {{champion:7}}
